card_text: Target 1 monster on the field or in either GY, then activate 1 of these appropriate effects;$N●Attach the targeted monster to 1 Rank 2 monster you control as material.$N●Place the targeted monster your opponent controls in your zone your Link-2 monster points to, and take control of it.$N●Special Summon the targeted monster from either GY to your zone your Link-2 monster points to.$NYou can only activate 1 "Spright Double Cross" per turn.
